info.description: Platform where users can manage and join programming projects
info.title: Build Me

tags.name: Answers
tags.description: Manage the available answers for each question

tags.name: Learners
tags.description: Allow users to associate with a vacancy as learners, individuals who will learn about the technologies required for the vacancy with the help of the selected candidate

tags.name: Projects
tags.description: Manage programming projects where the users can colaborate by joining on related vacancies

tags.name: Questions
tags.description: Manage the questions that can be associated with answers and used to create tests for evaluating the user’s skills

tags.name: Rankings
tags.description: Displays user information sorted into rankings based on various parameters, such as: the highest number of reviews received, the highest number of project participations, and more

tags.name: Ratings
tags.description: Manage the ratings that were created to assess the performance of colleagues in a project

tags.name: Technologies
tags.description: Administer the technologies that can be designated as requirements for projects' vacancies and user skills

tags.name: Tests
tags.description: Management of tests that evaluate the skill level of a user in a certain technology

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Manage the users that can use the platform

post.description: Create answers for questions that users can select during tests

value.message: It's not possible to add a new learner, the limit of 5 learners related to this vacancy was already reached
